title: Aura
description: Brooke Everett is an eighteen year old girl who recently survived a horrible car wreck in which she lost her father. Soon after the accident, Brooke and her boyfriend are mugged and once again, she survives and he does not. Now she suffers from debilitating migraines and strange auras and feels as though she is cursed somehow from surviving twice while her loved ones did not.She moves across the country to live with her mother and closer to her older brother. She throws herself into training to compete in wakeboarding to keep her mind off of her past. Slater moved to Truckee, CA with his police detective father and sought friendship in all the wrong places - until Brooke Everett arrives. The two become friends while Slater helps her train to compete in a wakeboarding competition in Lake Tahoe.Can Brooke allow herself to get close to someone else? Can she get a handle on the fact that she is begining to believe she is seeing images of the future during her aura's? Just when she thinks she's getting a handle on it all and growing closer to Slater, she has a disturbing vision of his future and tries to pull away from him in the hopes of sparing him from the curse she believes exsists to those who get too close to her.
author: Tracy Younker
